items.title: Annoucing FluxStore 3.3
items.summary: Hi friends, InspireUI here with a big bag of improvement in the latest FluxStore release. First of all, we would…
items.content_html:
Hi friends, InspireUI here with a big bag of improvement in the latest FluxStore release.

First of all, we would like to thank you for putting your trust in InspireUI and our FluxStore products. Weâ€™re here to help you get your business better optimized, and excited to do our part in maintaining and upgrading the products to be more powerful, flexible, and high-performance.Â 

What news in FluxStore v3.3 ?

The release includes 148 merge requests including a lot of new features and important improvements.Â 

New features

â‡ï¸ New 2x performance improvement.
â‡ï¸ Easy & simply upgrade - see changelog
â‡ï¸ New TabMenu & Scrollable layout - see video
â‡ï¸ New Smart Engagement Banner - see video
â‡ï¸ Vertical Product Gallery - see video
â‡ï¸ Show SMS Login screen by Default.
â‡ï¸ Upgrade Category layout
â‡ï¸ Upgrade Product Detail themes.
â‡ï¸ New Phone Number Config.
â‡ï¸ Youtube video in Product Detail
â‡ï¸ New Languages: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ Azerbaijan, Urdu

Important improvements

â¡ï¸ Compatible with latest Flutter 3.3.x.
â¡ï¸ Limit Login Attempts Reloaded.
â¡ï¸ Cart icon for LTR and RTL
â¡ï¸ Support Android 13.
â¡ï¸ Ability to add Notes with Link on Order.
â¡ï¸ Upgrade all pubspec Libraries to latest.
â¡ï¸ Fix TikTok videos not load.
â¡ï¸ Fix video on TikTok that are stretched.
â¡ï¸ Fix general web item not update when login.
â¡ï¸ Fix multi language for brands.
â¡ï¸ Fix category product list.
â¡ï¸ Fix cannot update menu label.
â¡ï¸ Fix stuck at empty splash screen when isCaching config not loaded
â¡ï¸ Fix tap payment issue
â¡ï¸ Fix wrong shipping fee
â¡ï¸ Fix: max allow quantity when add product
â¡ï¸ Fix choose time of booking don't appear
â¡ï¸ Fix the app does not request permission push notification
â¡ï¸ Fix wrong currency in paystack payment
â¡ï¸ Fix total cart for subscription
â¡ï¸ Fix: click text story
â¡ï¸ Fix login for webview
â¡ï¸ Fix point redemption when create order
â¡ï¸ Fix defaultCurrency symbol in textField when editing product
â¡ï¸ Fix vertical layout column with filter UI
â¡ï¸ Fix missing author data of blog
â¡ï¸ Fix minor bugs in sms login
â¡ï¸ Fix AutoUpdate

items.title: Announcing FluxBuilder 1.5.x
items.summary: Proceed with the big success of the FluxBuilder version 1.4.x, InspireUI is constantly working hard to upgrade the drag and…
items.content_html:
Proceed with the big success of the FluxBuilder version 1.4.x, InspireUI is constantly working hard to upgrade the drag and dropÂ FluxBuilderÂ tool. And nowÂ FluxBuilder version 1.5.xÂ finally is published with more functionalities.

Try NowÂ â€” theÂ latest FluxBuilder.

Whatâ€™s new in FluxBuilder 1.5.x

FluxBuilder 1.5.1:
---
(1) GDPR & Account Deletion ğŸ†
(2) App Performance â­ï¸
(3) Tera Wallet ğŸ§§
(4) WooCommerce Appointments ğŸ“†
(5) MyFatoorah Payment ğŸ’°
(6) PayTM Payment ğŸ’°
(7) Tap Payment ğŸ’µ
(8) Search Product ğŸ”
(9) Cloud Config ğŸŒ¨ï¸FluxBuilder 1.5.0:
---
(10) Publish ğŸ–Œ
(11) Test APK & iOS ğŸ“²
(12) BigCommerce Platform ğŸ…±ï¸
(13) Webview+Token Feature ğŸŒˆ
(14) Product List's UIs ğŸ’¦Important Improvement:
---
+ Build On Cloud ğŸš€ {download, integration configs, copy log}
+ Homepage ğŸ¡ {Geo search, Tag, Banner Image-Horizontal, TikTok} 
+ Category ğŸ§° {Hide Empty Categories, Remap Categories}
+ Parallax Effect ğŸŒ 
+ Always Show AppBar â­ï¸
+ TabBar on Top ğŸŒ‡
+ Google Map ğŸ—º
+ Subscription ğŸŒNote: The detailed explaination is also updated via Changelog page.
Â 

(1) GDPR Compliance ğŸ†

As theÂ new requirementÂ from the Apple Store, when submitting new apps and app updates, they must include the Account DeletionÂ starting June 30, 2022, which let users initiate deletion of their account within the app to protect their data privacy.

Understand that, after developing this new feature forÂ FluxStore Apps, InspireUI has quickly added it to FluxBuilder â€”Â GDPR ComplianceÂ to support all users usingÂ FluxStore Apps.

GDPR ComplianceÂ feature provides both theÂ Account DeletionÂ option and the ability to show theÂ Privacy PoliciesÂ for the first time opening the app, which following theÂ GDPR complianceÂ affects all companies that do business in the EU, as the image below.

Now users can confidently publish their apps on Apple Store. Also, InspireUI can confidently provide the frequently updatedÂ FluxStore AppsÂ and FluxBuilder, saving hours of app development effort.

Â 

(2) App Performance âš¡ï¸

App Performance feature has been available onÂ FluxBuilder 1.5.1Â to take your app performance to a higher level. You are able to enable theÂ HTTP CacheÂ to save the performance and the repeat network request that will help the app load faster with the detailed guide attached.

The original product images usually cause slow app loading that we really do not want.Â Image OptimizationÂ helps to improve performance by enabling the loading of compressed thumbnails instead of original images. No more the app does not show product images.

Â 

(3) Tera Wallet ğŸ§§

FluxBuilder is becoming more and more varied in supported Features and Design. In version 1.5.1, the Terra Wallet will be the next feature added. Users can find it in theÂ Checkout & PaymentÂ ofÂ Features.

Actually, the Tera Wallet is familiar with users who are owning theÂ FluxStore Woocommerce,Â FluxStore Multi-Vendor, orÂ FluxStore ProÂ (Woocommerce) app.

Users just need to install and activate theÂ Tera WalletÂ on their websites. After that, go to the Profile tab and enable Tera Wallet inÂ General Settings. The feature will display after successful login.

Â 

(4) WooCommerce Appointments ğŸ“†

This would be the strangest new feature of FluxBuilder. Because the feature has been available for FluxStore Apps for a long time ago and why is it included in FluxBuilder until version 1.5.1?

In previous times, FluxBuilder focuses more on Design and complex Features to make it easier when creating apps. At the present, FluxBuilder is gradually developing more for all features to produce convenience and shorter the time of setting up the app.

For theÂ WooCommerce Appointments, users can set the maximum booking date limit, by enablingÂ Advance Booking LimitÂ and adjusting the limit variable. If users do not set a value for it, the booking feature will not limit the time that an appointment can be booked.

Â 

(5) MyFatoorah Payment ğŸ’°

The developerâ€™s group at InspireUI has just implemented thisÂ MyFatoorah paymentÂ on the latestÂ FluxStoreÂ 3.0.2 apps. And simultaneously support to enable this payment on the drag and drop FluxBuidler tool for users to easily configure.

(6) Tap Payment ğŸ’µ

Following the familiar payment features in FluxBuilder in previous versions, the new checkout payment has been implemented â€” Tap Payment.

There is a selection to enable or disable the payments. Besides, obviously, users can set up the Payment on FluxBuilder easily by inputting the feature config information. For example, users need to submit theÂ Secret KeyÂ andÂ Payment Method IDÂ to make the Tap Payment work on the app after enabling.

(7) PayTM Payment ğŸ’°

In addition, weâ€™ve also added the PayTM payment.Â PayTM Payment GatewayÂ should be installed on the website first. Then, in FluxBuilder, just input theÂ Payment Method IDÂ andÂ Merchant IdentifierÂ to configure this payment.

Â 

(8) Search Product ğŸ”

Users often search using precise product identifiers, such as stock keeping units (SKU), that vendors set and use to track the movement of their inventory. Searching by SKU makes it easier for users to find the product theyâ€™re looking for.

This effectiveÂ Search ProductÂ feature provides the ability to enable or disable the SKU search or the ultimate WordPress search engineÂ Ajax Search Pro, which is available for WooCommerce.

Â 

(9) Cloud Config ğŸŒ¨

TheÂ Cloud ConfigÂ feature will join to supportÂ updating the app DesignÂ without re-publishing to Apple Store and Google Play by simple steps:

1ï¸âƒ£ SimplyÂ createÂ an account on any Cloud Server.
2ï¸âƒ£ ThenÂ uploadÂ the config JSON files to the Cloud ServerÂ (which is the app Design that you would like to update. You can use theÂ ExportÂ feature to export the Design config JSON files).
3ï¸âƒ£Â CopyÂ a URL link (example:Â https://yourname.vercel.app/config_en.json) andÂ inputÂ it to Cloud Config as the image below:

Of course, users ofÂ FluxStore WooCommerce,Â FluxStore Multi Vendors,Â FluxStore ProÂ (WooCommerce only), andÂ FluxNewsÂ apps haveÂ two flexible waysÂ to update Design without re-publishing:
1ï¸âƒ£ Use thisÂ Cloud ConfigÂ feature. Remember toÂ turn offÂ the MStore-API Caching on App Performance.
2ï¸âƒ£ Or upload the config JSON files toÂ MStore APIÂ plugin in their websites easilyÂ (no need to use this Cloud Config feature). Just remember toÂ enableÂ the MStore-API Caching.

Â 

(10) Publish ğŸ–Œ

In addition to the Cloud Config above, this Publish feature could be seen as one of the signatures of FluxBuilder because of its amazing benefit to users.

One thing we love about FluxBuilder is that it does not just update the app Design â€” it also updates both theÂ Design and FeaturesÂ of apps without re-publishing to App Stores by clicking the greenÂ PublishÂ button as in the image below:

The Cloud Config feature helps users configure the cloud information for the first time. After publishing the app to App Stores, sometimes they need to update theÂ DesignÂ of apps without re-publishing to App Stores. Instead of uploading the config JSON files to the Cloud Server or MStore API plugin on their websites, users are able to do itÂ directlyÂ from the FluxBuilder tool via theÂ PublishÂ feature.

Â 

(11) Test APK & iOS ğŸ“²

Immediately experience the app designed by yourself on real devicesÂ in 1 minute.

This sounds crazy but itâ€™s true. Now, all users (even presale customers) can easily see how their app looks on their phones after designed byÂ FluxBuilder.

Because of framework limitations, the simulator onÂ FluxBuilderÂ is not able to display some design items on FluxBuilderÂ (such as TikTok videos, Html, etc.). To quickly solve the problem, InspireUI has provided theÂ Test APKÂ andÂ Test iOSÂ to help users test their app DESIGN on Android PhonesÂ (and the file is for testing purposes only so publishing is impossible).

ğŸš¨ However, please notice that there are stillÂ some features requiring additional configuration, such asÂ Map, Social Login, Push Notifications, Dynamic Link, Realtime Chat, Ads. So if theyÂ do not work, it is properly because they need to be set as the corresponding manual tutorial to work well on the app, and someÂ FluxStore appsÂ need to install the integration API.

Â 

(12) BigCommerce Platform ğŸ…±ï¸

Together with the launching of theÂ FluxStore BigCommerceÂ app, FluxBuilder now supports BigCommerce as it has been doing with the other FluxStore apps. Users can create, design, and customize the BigCommerce app and build the app by FluxBuilder.

Â 

(13) Webview+Token Feature ğŸŒˆ

â€œI want every user to be logged in to the App and the Webview sections of same website in the App also at the App Login itself.â€ â€” a user suggested.

InspireUI and users sometimes will be on the same wavelength accidentally. Because of that, the Webview & Token feature which was identified as â€œa must-have featureâ€ and â€œan amazing featureâ€ was quickly added to FluxBuilder to support users.

After logging into the App, it is no longer necessary to re-login to access the Webview Page. Currently, the feature is supported on 3 main screens: Settings, Side menu, and TabBar.

Especially, users can use Javascript to hide some webview UI on the app.

Â 

(14) Product List ğŸ’¦

The Product List feature in this new version of FluxBuilder has been upgraded with more functionalities. Now there are 3 UIs on the Product List screen which users can choose to show Images or only Title.

The bottom-corner Cart icon is also able to be enabled or hidden on the Product List screen.

Â 

Important Improvements

There are many powerful improvements on the FluxBuidler 1.5.x, such as:

ğŸš€Â Build On Cloud: the newÂ Integration ConfigsÂ feature lets users know which configuration they have done or not. Or theÂ Copy LogÂ button helps users to copy and send to our technical team to more easily investigate the issue you encountered. Additionally,Â downloadÂ the Keystore, Certificate, and Provisioning files which are created automatically from the drag&drop FluxBuilder.

ğŸ¡ On theÂ Homepage, a bunch of features are included according to the requirements of users to provide a good experience:

  • Banner Image: provideÂ HorizontalÂ type, you can add a multi-image banner as horizontal with support for smooth scrolling.
  • Geo Search
  • Support users toÂ selectÂ TagÂ after choosing a Category onÂ Product HorizontalÂ orÂ Banner ImageÂ items.
  • TikTokÂ videos widget ğŸ¸: Responding to the high inquiry about adding TikTok videos to the app, FluxBuilder instantly launches the new Widget for the Home page â€” TikTok Videos Widget. The feature does not require many steps to show up a range of videos on your TikTok channel â€” just input the TikTok account name. Itâ€™s DONE!

ğŸ§° On theÂ CategoryÂ screen, many clients would like to display Categories that do not have any products, while others do not like to show them. So we add theÂ Hide Empty CategoryÂ feature to the Category tab for flexible configuration.

Besides that, some request that FluxBuilder should support Categories Remap to help them define a new multi-category tree that is different from the backend site.

WithÂ Category Remap, users can control the Location, Order, and Level of the Category.

It is very useful for theÂ Shopify appÂ whose categories do not have multi-level!

  • Other features such as Parallax Effect, TabBar on Top, always show AppBar,Â Google Map,Â SubscriptionÂ to extend your expired Technical Support time, etc.
Â 

Your feedbacks are welcome â¤ï¸

Letâ€™s be a part ofÂ FluxBuilderÂ âœˆï¸ develop your creativity âœˆï¸

InspireUI gives FluxBuilder the first steps, but the outstanding success of this drag and drop tool has been built from the suggestions and recommendations of consumers.

Basically, most of the fundamental features of a mobile app are consisted in this tool. You are able to easily create your own app with FluxBuilder in a short time.

However, FluxBuilder is more than that. We highly appreciate all of your cooperation ideas and we are working every day to constantly improve and innovate it to give you the flexibility to take full advantage of this drag&drop tool.

Thank you for your support ofÂ FluxBuilderÂ tool andÂ FluxStore AppsÂ â¤ï¸ Welcome toÂ FluxBuilder 1.5!

items.title: How to create Apps using FluxBuider?
items.summary: Hello again from InspireUI team!ğŸ‘‹ This is the guide for new users to use theÂ latest Drag&drop FluxBuilder 1.2.3 This drag&drop…
items.content_html:
Hello again from InspireUI team!ğŸ‘‹ This is the guide for new users to use theÂ latest Drag&drop FluxBuilder 1.2.3

This drag&drop tool is compatible with allÂ FluxStore appsÂ (exceptÂ FluxStore ManagerÂ andÂ FluxStore Delivery Boy). We will keep the blog post as short as possible. Letâ€™s goğŸ„â€â™€ï¸

There are 6 stepsÂ to useÂ FluxBuilderÂ for your Website:
1. Download and InstallÂ FluxBuilder
2. Sign Up, then Login
3. Integrate with your website
4. Customize the Design
5. Customize the Features
6. Build your app (APK, IPA)
Others
ğŸ’Â InspireUIÂ Youtube

Â 

1. Download and InstallğŸ“¦

Click here forÂ Video guide.

Download the latest FluxBuilderÂ here. It is available for Windows and macOS.
To install on MacOS successfully,Â Right-clickÂ on FluxBuilder.pkg > selectÂ OpenÂ >Â OpenÂ again. Itâ€™ll work!

2. Sign Up, then Loginâœ¨

Click here forÂ Video guide.

After launching FluxBuilder, sign up a new account and login:
SelectÂ LoginÂ >Â Sign Up:

  • Input your name, email, and new password, then selectÂ Sign UpÂ button.
  • Check your mailbox for the activation email, activate it. Then login to FluxBuilder.

Solve Issue: IfÂ nothing displays when youâ€™re typing, please change to English keyboard (typing in English).

3. Integrate with your Websiteâš¡ï¸

Click here forÂ Video guide.

Follow 3 simple steps:

  1. Select DASHBOARD, thenÂ Create New App

2. Input your Website URL, and keys (if any), then clickÂ Run Troubleshoot

  • Make sure you inputÂ httpsÂ instead of http.
  • Make sure you doÂ not input sub-folder domainÂ like thisÂ https://yaari.store/pk-enÂ because it causes Rest API issue. Please change to subdomain or main domain.

3. Select a template

4. Customize the Designâ­ï¸

Click here forÂ Video guide.

If youÂ can not drag&dropÂ the elements on theÂ right panel,Â press & holdÂ inÂ 2â€“3 secondsÂ then drag & drop.
You also can drag&dropÂ TabsÂ on the left menu.

Check theÂ CheckListÂ for detail.

5. Customize the Featuresâœ¨

Click here forÂ Video guide.

Precondition: Activate with your purchase code ofÂ FluxStore or FluxNewsÂ apps (regular or extended licenses).

Check theÂ CheckListÂ for the detailed features.

6. Build your app (APK, IPA)ğŸš€

Click here forÂ Video guide.

Precondition: Activate with your Extended license ofÂ FluxStoreÂ apps.

  • With regular license, you can build your app with Android studio and Flutter with this guideÂ https://support.inspireui.com/
  • With extended license, useÂ this guideÂ after purchase.

OthersğŸ‘

1. Importâœ¨

Click here forÂ Video guide.

In case you already had your ownÂ .jsonÂ orÂ env.dartÂ file (in source code ofÂ FluxStoreÂ apps). And now you would like to change the app Design or Features. Just import it into the FluxBuilder tool to continue customization.

  • Import the Design: refer toÂ Import Config DESIGN, openÂ .jsonÂ file (it usually is theÂ lib/config/config_en.jsonÂ file in your FluxStore source code).
  • Import the Features: refer toÂ Import Config ENV, open theÂ lib/env.dartÂ file.

2. ExportğŸ„â€â™€ï¸

Click here forÂ Video guide.

  • After designing your app via the FluxBuilder tool, you will export the customized design and feature files and save them to your FluxStore/FluxNews source code.
  • On MacOS, it supports the short-cut to copy the JSON Design content to Clipboard by pressingÂ Command âŒ˜ + C
  • Precondition: Activate with your purchase code ofÂ FluxStore or FluxNewsÂ apps (regular or extended licenses).

3. Update Design without re-Publishingâ­ï¸

You are able to update Design without re-publishing to AppStore/Google Play. FollowÂ this guideÂ after purchase.

4. Dark & Light themesğŸ“²

Click here forÂ Video guide.

  • Dark theme of App:
  • Dark theme of FluxBuilder:

5. Discover our Appsâœ¨

More information about theÂ FluxStore or FluxNewsÂ apps.

InspireUI YoutubeğŸ“€

Feel free to subscribeÂ to ourÂ InspireUIÂ channel and press the bell icon to get notifications about new videos.

We are releasingÂ a series of FluxBuilder videosÂ to help users being familiar and easier in using this Drag&drop FluxBuilder toolğŸ™‚

Preview all of our FluxStore applications:

Preview our Showcase videosÂ and more:

Thank you so much and we look forward to serving you!

items.title: Announcing FluxStore 2.5.x
items.summary: New Powerful features are ready for downloading ğŸŠ New Features: --- (1) New Design Horizontal Product Layoutâš¡ï¸ (2) Barcode &…
items.content_html:
New Powerful features are ready for downloading ğŸŠ

Whatâ€™s new in FluxStore App 2.5.3

New Features:
---
(1) New Design Horizontal Product Layoutâš¡ï¸
(2) Barcode & QR code ScannerğŸ“²
(3) New Drawer Menu LayoutğŸŒˆ
(4) New Basic Layout Widgets (Button, Space...)â­
(5) New PayTM PaymentğŸ’°
(6) Re-OrderğŸ’«
(7) New Languages: SwedishğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ª, FinlandğŸ‡«ğŸ‡®, GreekğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡·, KhmerğŸ‡°ğŸ‡­, Marathi, KannadağŸ‡®ğŸ‡³Important Improvement:
---
+ Compatible with latest Flutter 2.5.3 (Channel Stable)
+ Update all pubspec library to latest version
+ Support config for old and new SmartChat layout
+ Update the SMS Login to support RTL
+ Shorten firebase dynamic link
+ Upgrade flutter_local_notification 9.0.2
+ Disable the bottom cart in My WishList screen
+ Disable bottom bar when navigating to Webview Payment
+ Fetch Blog by Tag
+ Upgrade MStore API to support OneSignal Notification
+ Apply app Rating Disable condition
+ Show Delivery Date in the Order History Detail screen
+ Tera Wallet: TopUp via WebviewNote: The detail explaination is also update via Changelog page.

(1) New Design Horizontal Product Layoutâš¡ï¸

Products layout is Pixel-perfect design on different types of layout screens, we have upgraded it more flexible to adapt from simple to complexity features.

  • Support Background Image to display the impressive promotion banner 1ï¸âƒ£
  • Support the Multi Colors Background with flexible Size Adjustment 2ï¸âƒ£
  • The Product List could be configured by the primary color 3ï¸âƒ£
  • NewÂ FluxStore appsÂ are compatible very well with the newÂ drag&drop FluxBuilder toolÂ that helps to customize the app with super easy steps. No worries, you will not require the programming skills to do these fancy UIs.
  • Easy to design the Banner & all the detailed properties viaÂ FluxBuilderÂ 4ï¸âƒ£
  • Easy to control the Shadow of Product Card, also the Spacing, Marginâ€¦5ï¸âƒ£
  • Support multiRow with multiColumn, easy to control the grid Ratio 6ï¸âƒ£
Â 

(2) Barcode & QR code Scanner âš¡ï¸

  • Support formats: EAN 8, EAN 13, UPC A, CODE 39, CODE 93, CODE 128, CODABAR, QRCODE.
  • Support Product/Order Info.
  • Required Plugins:Â YITH WOOCOMMERCE BARCODES AND QR CODES, or any plugins that generate Barcodes and QR codes.
  • Demo video:
Â 

(3) New Drawer Menu Layout ğŸŒˆ

  • Ability to manage the list of Dynamic Menu items 1ï¸âƒ£
  • Be able to customize many Design Styles. It could change the Angle, Radius, or the Position of the menu 2ï¸âƒ£
  • Changing the Background, Text Color, Icon Color, or you are able to even apply the Background Filter from Flutter 3ï¸âƒ£
Â 

(4) New Basic Layout Widgetsâ­

  • We also upgrade some Basic Widgets that are missing from the previous version: Buttons, Divider and Spacer.
  • The Button Types could display as multi-Touchable with the different Actions. For example: adding a list of Social Button Icons.
Â 

(5) PayTM PaymentğŸ’°

  • As some clients requested: â€œPayTM payment gateway is more popular in India because its UPI and Rupay Debit Card Transaction Commission is 0% lowestâ€, etc.
  • We also listen to this request and upgrade this native feature under a Regular License source code.
  • If you have any further requests, please donâ€™t forget to submit on this linkÂ https://new.inspireui.com

(6) Re-OrderğŸ’«

  • Users can order again by using the Re-Order button in the Order History.
  • Demo video:
Â 

(7) New LanguagesğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ª

  • There are 6 new native languages supported: Swedish ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ª, Finland ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡®, Greek ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡·, Khmer ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡­, Marathi ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³, Kannada ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³
  • Thank you to the great FluxStore community to contribute these languages so that FluxStore could supportÂ +30 languagesÂ so far â¤ï¸

(8) New Serverless Notion AppğŸŠ

  • Our team has released the newbornÂ FluxStore NotionÂ to the ecosystem of FluxStore apps. This is a new product that supports a Small Business for whom has an online store but would like to use theÂ NotionÂ to manage the Product data.
  • We will update another guideline to introduce this product later. For more information please check out this link:

FluxStore Notion - Serverless Flutter App for Notion

Version: 1.0.1 - support new Flutter 2.5.x - Last update:22 Nov 2021 â€‹- Changelog, Youtube - Files Included: Fullâ€¦

1.envato.market

Â 
Â 

Last month,Â InspireUIÂ has become theÂ Power Elite AuthorÂ (level 12). We truly thank our Customers who have contributed and supported us. We could not reach this achievement without all your support.

Also, thank the Team has been working hard to upgrade the products every day to keep the apps more stable and have rich functionalities.
